synopsis.text: Work from Tokyo University of the Arts, 2010, presents an intriguing tale of a frog who stands out from the crowd with his unique armlet and distinct skin color. With a burning desire to organize his fellow frogs into a line, the story delves into the dynamics between those who rule and those who are ruled. As unexpected events unfold, the consequences of these power structures are explored in this thought-provoking animation directed by Shiho Nagasako, accompanied by the music of Shogo Isozaki and sound design by Yurie Tsutsumi. Prepare to be captivated by this insightful examination of leadership and its impact on a community.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
